item.description:
OK, a beautiful Friday night and we are going flying!!! Let's shoot down to this place in Groton for some views, sunset and seafood.... Bring your favorite wife and a camera :)

We can meet at Charleys hangar.. Looks like a great flyday!

Restaraunt is here... Can be pricey. Unless we opt elsewhere.... http://www.sp-oyster....

http://www.navmonster...

S&P Oyster is a restaurant in the heart of downtown Mystic, just at the eastern side of the bridge, that serves excellent seafood in a cheerful, casual setting. Seating is available indoors and out, and is adjacent to the water taxi that will take you to Mystic Seaport. Service was excellent on a mid-September Sunday, but expect crowds during the peak summer season. You will need to take a taxi or ask the FBO to drop you downtown, which is only about 4 miles from the airport.

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Friday Night ... Sunset and Seafood and Scenery
